short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful utilities for the Knack.com Builder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides the following features to the Knack Builder:

- Quick search of all top-level pages and objects.
- Search by object/page key.
- Auto retry for annoying "There has been a network error" messages.
- (coming soon) Easily view object/page/view keys.
- (coming soon) Intellisense for JavaScript and CSS code editors.
